name: Intermission (Jack F)
description:
Select a text document on your computer and destroy it with a space ship!

Move forward with W key, turn left and right with A key and D key respectively, shoot by Left Clicking, and scroll the document with the Scroll wheel on your mouse.

You can press P to save a copy of the edited document to where ever the source document it...I think.

I just did the music for this one this time.
